```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE) 
library(gsheet)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r huds}
hudsdata<-gsheet2tbl('https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1S3vFDul1PeB84Zd8G5ewe1ocZ6ezidQzAp5gn1eiHtQ/edit#gid=0')
```

```{r huds, echo = FALSE}
frequency_plot <- hudsdata %>% 
  group_by(Food) %>% 
  summarize(count=n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(count))

  

```
